subtitle: A basic recipe. Add some curry powder to the onion, garlic and lamb when frying for a quick and easy curry.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Fry the onion, garlic and lamb for about 5 min until well browned.
Stir in the tomatoes, stock, tomato puree, Worcestershire sauce, herbs and seasoning. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 15 min, stirring occasionally. Use as required.
